webshopId.label: Webshop-ID
webshopId.tooltipText: The Webshop-ID being used to authenticate with ratenkauf by easyCredit API.

apiPassword.label: API Password
apiPassword.tooltipText: The API Key is being used to authenticate with ratenkauf by easyCredit API.

paymentStatus.label: Payment status
paymentStatus.tooltipText: Define the payment status of orders paid with ratenkauf by easyCredit

orderStatus.label: Order status
orderStatus.tooltipText: Define the order status of orders paid with ratenkauf by easyCredit

removeInterest.label: Remove interest from order
removeInterest.tooltipText: Removes the interest from orders after the order has been placed

widgetEnabled.label: Show widget
widgetEnabled.tooltipText: If this option is active, the widget will be shown using the selector below.

widgetSelectorProductDetail.label: CSS selector for product detail page

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The ratenkauf by easyCredit settings have been saved successfully.
settingForm.messageTestSuccess: The API credentials have been successfully validated.
settingForm.messageTestError: The API credentials could not been validated.
